Articles.Content:
Good morning everyone.
A question....
I run with Ksp 1.6
and one of the Mods I love to use, is Kerbalism.
Well since the 1.5 and 1.6 of ksp it is impossible for me to play with that mods.
In the 1.6 ksp, every time I start it detects kerbalsm as a lower version than the one I downloaded. I walk with the last Kerbalism 2.1.1.
Even so the game starts without problems.
The problem starts when I start with the construction of something.
At the moment I put the 1 Piece, it starts to give me some micro jumps, sometimes very fast every 2 seconds and sometimes a few seconds more. Unbearable Play like this.
Try a clean installation of the 1.6 with only those mods. The game goes well, until I put the 1 piece and back with the same.
At the moment I remove that mods Out problems.
In Ksp 1.5 the same.
It is the mods that I like the most ...
Since I tried it ... I can not boot KSP without it.
I see videos of people running it in the 1.6 without problems ..
And tried to find information about it .... Nothing. I can not find anyone with that problem ....

I have
i7700 K 4.8ghz / GTX 1080 16Gb Ram ddr4 300.
......
I would appreciate some help ...
Forgive x the piece of text.

Hello, and welcome to the forums!

Moving to Technical Support, since this isn't an add-on release.

(Though if you're having trouble with a particular mod, the best place to ask is usually in that mod's release thread, since that's where the experts hang out.)

I've had this EXACT problem.  It didn't happen before 1.5 and I was hoping it would be fixed in 1.6, but it isn't.  I've asked in the Kerbalism thread, but I've yet to get a response.  I'm sorry that I can't offer any help, but if you do find a fix, let me know.
